# Thy Outstanding Problems

This page is intended to document problems I haven't yet solved with Thy.

## Dependency Resolution Typing

I've tried to scheme a way to type the `thy()` dependency resolution function
in TypeScript, but I've run into circular type dependency errors.
This may be an unsolvable problem, and I haven't come up with a good workaround.

To be clear, the runtime of this function is not a problem, just the types.

I tried to solicit some help [in the TypeScript Discord](https://discord.com/channels/508357248330760243/1155185059859546152/1155185059859546152),
but I only got one person's attempt, and it did not work.

Attempts so far:
